Text: Its not fake I just watched it. Quality is good not perfect but good for a cam. Any subtitles are in Chinese though which isn't a big deal if you've seen it in theaters. If you haven't I really recommend doing that.

ppl confirmed me its a CAM Rip.

sorry for confusion. Wait for bluray rip :)
I hope the ending credits scene is shown?
Yes it is a Webcam version not a Scr - so technically it is a fake, but not a total fake.  BTW there is NO SUCH THING as a WEBScr - so if you see someone posting this crap just avoid it.
